title: AI For Everyone
description: This course, led by Andrew Ng, is designed for non-technical professionals and covers the impact of AI on business and society. It is free and takes about 10 hours to complete.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: This specialization provides a foundational understanding of machine learning, including supervised and unsupervised learning, best practices for model evaluation, and real-world applications. It includes multiple courses designed to help beginners grasp the basics of machine learning.

title: LangChain for LLM Application Development
description: This course introduces LangChain for building large language model (LLM) applications. It covers the basics of using LangChain and how to develop applications that leverage LLMs.

title: Functions, Tools and Agents with LangChain
description: This short course focuses on using LangChain Expression Language (LCEL) to build and customize conversational agents and other LLM-based applications.

title: Structuring Machine Learning Projects
description: This course focuses on how to structure machine learning projects to ensure success. It is suitable for beginners and covers key strategies and best practices for working on AI projects.
